description:
After a big fight, Ranma is beaten up badly by Akane. She takes him to Dr. Tofu`s clinic to be treated...
Source: hulu

titles.title: Adeline et Ranma sont en froid
Hone made Aishite? Akane Koi no Fukuzatsu Kossetsu
Love Me to the Bone! The Compound Fracture of Akane`s Heart
骨まで愛して? あかね恋の複雑骨折
